content: Create directory structure for the refactored codebase
Extract constants and configuration values
Create calculation utilities and helper functions
Split into smaller, focused components
Implement proper state management
Add input validation and error handling
Fix critical bugs (division by zero, parseInt issues)
Add TypeScript types for better type safety
Create tests for calculation functions
Improve performance with memoization
Create main App component and remaining UI components
Fix accessibility issues - add id/name attributes to form fields
Fix accessibility issues - add labels to all form fields
Create GitHub Actions workflow for automated testing
Implement WiT_Risk_Score calculation script
Set up Lighthouse CI for performance monitoring
Implement Risk Score feature based on emissions intensity
Add Loan Calculator with risk-based interest rates
Create technical documentation with equations and constants
Implement Scenario Builder - quick win demo
Create side-by-side comparison view
Document next-phase roadmap
Create dashboard architecture with ViewContext
Migrate existing JSX to dashboard components
Implement lazy loading for chart libraries
Add Suspense boundaries for code splitting
Fix emissions calculations to properly reflect poor performance
Add performance penalties for suboptimal KPIs
Adjust risk scoring sensitivity
Sprint 0: Refresh technical documentation with v3 architecture
Sprint 1: Re-enable feed parameters in Basic dashboard
Sprint 2: Implement NUE (Nitrogen Use Efficiency) into LME calculations
Sprint 3: Add feed levers and NUE hooks to Scenario Builder
Sprint 4: Update exports (CSV/PDF) to include NUE metrics
Sprint 5: Stakeholder testing and risk matrix validation
V4 Sprint 0: Add Theoretical Minimum constants and calculations
V4 Sprint 1: Implement Net-Carbon Glide Path 2.0 with TM line
V4 Sprint 2: Add Reduction Pathway logic
V4 Sprint 3: Create Green Financing module
V4 Sprint 4: Link financing to scenarios
V4 Sprint 5: Update docs and exports for V4
Debug missing features in production deployment
Optimize bundle size to under 150KB gzipped
Improve Lighthouse mobile score to 92+
Create v4 documentation tag and CHANGELOG
Add React.memo to heavy chart components
Implement feature flags system
Fix test suite for deployment readiness
Create deployment documentation for auto-compaction
Move Feed Parameters from BasicDashboard to FarmDashboard
Replace all dollar symbols with GBP pounds
Add milk price to state management
Create milk price slider in sidebar
Update economics calculations to use dynamic milk price
Update UI components to show reactive profit/revenue
Add tests for milk price changes
Debug milk price slider not showing in production
Update technical documentation with milk price feature
Fix documentation inconsistencies from technical audit
Fix codebase to match corrected documentation
Remove duplicate feed parameter controls from BasicDashboard
P0: Add ESLint + Prettier configuration
P0: Add dependency audit to CI pipeline
P0: Add unit tests for economics calculations
P0: Add unit tests for greenFinancing calculations
P0: Add unit tests for performance calculations
P0: Add hook tests for useGlidePath
P0: Add integration test for Feed Quality to emissions flow

P1: Add jest-axe for accessibility testing
P1: Fix color-only indicators in Sidebar
Housekeeping: Review and clean up project files
Remove obsolete session and handoff documentation files
Remove empty directories (chat, financing, src/tests)
Fix GitHub Actions CI failures
Fix all ESLint errors in codebase
